name: 5 Nights at Steve's
description:
Gameplay

You have broken into Steve's Fun'n'Family friendly Pizzeria at 3AM. Your goal is to consume all 9 Pizzas without being consumed by Steve. This game offers a life-changing experience for the whole family, a poetic masterpiece unlike any other (thankfully).

Controls
  • WASD - Move
  • MOUSE - Look
  • E - Interact
  • SHIFT - Sprint
  • CTRL - Crouch
  • TAB - Cheats (for N00bs)
  • SPACE - Jump*
  • LMB - Shoot*
